articles.title: Wildfires Rage Across California and Oregon, Prompting Evacuations
articles.description: Dangerous heat is fueling growing wildfires in the Western U.S., with the Pickett Fire roaring through Northern California's wine country and the Flat Fire exploding in size in central Oregon, threatening thousands of homes and prompting evacuations. [5, 6, 8]

articles.title: Ukraine Marks Independence Day with Major Strikes as Peace Talks Remain Stalled
articles.description: Ukraine marked its Independence Day with drone strikes deep inside Russia targeting energy facilities. Meanwhile, U.S.-led peace talks between Ukraine and Russia have stalled, with Russia's Foreign Minister stating no meeting is planned between the Russian and Ukrainian leaders. [5, 6]

articles.title: Multiple Journalists Among Those Killed in Israeli Strikes on Gaza Hospital
articles.description: Four journalists were among at least eight people killed in an Israeli strike on a hospital in southern Gaza. One of the deceased was a freelancer who worked for the Associated Press. [3, 8, 13, 15]
